overview: Danny Johnson’s hilarious, clean stand-up has entertained audiences in comedy clubs, corporate events, and churches nationwide. Often called a cross between Jerry Seinfeld and Kevin James; Danny’s show is relatable, engaging, and always hilarious. Danny has starred in numerous TV commercials, Comedy Central’s Laugh Riots, Florida’s Funniest Comedian semi-finalist, Winner-Carnival Cruise line Comedy Challenge, Finalist in Search for the One Christian Comedy contest, and has had the pleasure of sharing the stage with Chris Rock, Bob Saget, Billy Gardell, Richard Lewis, and a variety of others. Danny has led a dual track career for over a decade; achieving success in both corporate America and as a comedian.  Blending his unique skill sets led to him publishing his first book, "You Stink and They Know It!  A practical guide to nailing your next job interview."
title: Danny Johnson
